overview: Eva is a young photographer who seeks to find herself in images. Miguel, a painter who has the magical power to transform the portrait of his clients and offer them what they want to be. Jhonny is a wandering Peruvian vendor who walks through Mexican streets offering stories and memories. These are three stories, about memory, common lives that have a path that unites them, the portrait of who they are and what they want to be.
title: Retrato peruano del Perú
